 
$client = new CognitoIdentityProviderClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'region' => 'us-east-2',
    'version' => '2016-04-18'
]);

$results = 20;

try {
    $result = $client->listUserPools([
        'MaxResults' => $results, 
    ]);
    
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage() . "\n";
    error_log($e->getMessage());
}
